text: Rafael Benítez (born 16 April 1960) is a Spanish former football player and football manager who was most recently the manager of Premier League club Everton. == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish football managers Category:Footballers from Madrid Category:CD Tenerife managers Category:Real Madrid CF managers Category:Real Madrid Castilla managers Category:Valencia CF managers Category:Association football coaches
title: Rafael Benítez
